description:
Title: 03:00-03:59

Platform: Browser

Genre: Text-based, mystery

Target Market: Supernatural fans,  Ages 12+

Game Overview: In this text-based mystery game, embark on a journey to discover the complex relationship between two characters as the hour of 3 A.M. unfolds.

Instructions: Read the text blurbs and click the blue text to continue the story. Choose the path that you think will resolve your conflict.

Game Design Team: Madison Prinzo- Game Designer
